attributes.action: Stop councils persecuting  the unemployed  the sick the disabled and poor .
attributes.additional_details: By persecuting these people who are already under a massive amount of stress, councils are also adding to mental health issues .The solution is simple stop charging council tax on the unemployed ,the sick , the disabled and poor pensioners . Stop persecuting people some of the most vulnerable people in the uk .please share this petition   get this disgrace  stopped.
attributes.background: Councils are  choosing, deliberately choosing   to charge council tax to unemployed people,  people who are sick,  people who are disabled and pensioners, persecuting  these people with  court and bailiffs knocking on their door.Creating more homelessness ,more suicide,more people using food banks.

rejection.details:
We understand that you'd like changes to be made to the council tax system, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do - for example, you could call for certain people to be exempt from paying council tax.
